instrument.description: Instrument: OLCI=Ocean and Land Colour Instrument, SLSTR=Sea and Land Surface Temperature Radiometer, SRAL=SAR Radar Altimeter, MWR=Microwave Radiometer

product_type.description: Product type identifier, varies by instrument (e.g., 'EFR' for OLCI full resolution)

start_datetime.description: UTC date and time when acquisition started, format YYYYMMDDThhmmss, valid ranges enforced

stop_datetime.description: UTC date and time when acquisition ended, format YYYYMMDDThhmmss, valid ranges enforced

track_number.description: Track number within the cycle (3 digits)
